name: jurisdictional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with the authority of a court or official organization to make decisions and judgments: jurisdictional decisions The Constitution limits the jurisdictional reach of state courts. See
jurisdiction
More examplesFewer examplesjurisdictional conflicts between state and federal officialsThe two agencies are so different in size and have different jurisdictional boundaries.The purpose of the agreement is to end jurisdictional disputes among the unions.
